rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0001
rows.name:
*sigh* Come on, throw me a bone here,
people...

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0002
rows.name: Have you heard of Mannam Juice?

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0003
rows.name:
It's a local beverage that's closely
associated with the village of Pom.
Very traditional!

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0004
rows.name:
It's a really sweet, sort of smelly drink,
made from year-old Melosian Honey!

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0005
rows.name:
It's actually produced here in Torigo,
but it's not exactly the most popular
thing around here. Only in Pom!

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0006
rows.name:
Which is why my husband's in the
business of delivering it. Only thing is,
the roads are pretty dangerous lately...

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm actually looking for some cheap,
decent bodyguards to help him out.

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0008
rows.name:
You're right...I get the feeling
he'd be safe as houses with
you guys on the job!

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0009
rows.name: I'll take you up on that offer!
